hooks.command: curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:3000/agent/start -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"taskId":"claude-session","prompt":"Claude Code session started"}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

jq -c '{taskId: "claude-session", level: "debug", message: ("Tool: " + (.tool_name // "unknown") + " completed")}' | curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:3000/agent/log -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d @- > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

jq -c '{taskId: "claude-session", level: "info", message: (.message // "Notification")}' | curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:3000/agent/log -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d @- > /dev/null 2>&1 || true
curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:3000/agent/done -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"taskId":"claude-session","summary":"Session ended"}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true
